original_text: When all our enemies heard about this, all the surrounding nations were afraid and lost their self-confidence, because they realized that this work had been done with the help of our God.
korean_text: 우리의 모든 대적과 주위에 있는 이방 족속들이 이를 듣고 다 두려워하여 크게 낙담하였으니 그들이 우리 하나님께서 이 역사를 이루신 것을 앎이니라

sentences.original_text: When all our enemies heard about this
sentences.korean_translation: 우리의 모든 원수들이 이 소식을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: all the surrounding nations were afraid
that this work had been done
with the help of our God
